title: ARAM PROS
body:
Sick of playing ARAM solo and not getting keys/chests? Join ARAM PROS, the only club for you!

For lovers of ARAM to group together and receive the added benefits of queuing with others!

Reply here or add me in game for invite.

replies.body:
I play Aram 99.5% of the time and play it seriously. I am tired of co op flops that play on Aram and disrespect team effort by throwing a game (How to make salt) I have over 1000 wins and play most champs.  Aram success is not about getting a good champ selection IMO its about understanding the map and most of all the enemy team champs.  That understanding IMO is having a club that shares the same knowledge and experience.  Don't let my name scare you lol I was drunk

Where is a club for me and how can I be beneficial to that club?
Yo if this is still going im down. I pretty much play ARAM only
Looking for Aram Buddies, send me an invite :D

Since my duo partner left to travel the world, all I've played for the last few months is Aram. Silver 3 this season, sup main =D

IGN: Iam Desk

Is this limited to some ranks only?
Bronze 1 noob right here...
As long as you know the basic mechanics of the champs you'll be fine. Happy to carry :D
Add me to the club then senpai {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I wouldn't mind checking out the club.
DeadlySecret
I have sent a friend request. I really enjoy playing aram but  I'm sick of playing with "bot", that's not fair !

Hey mate!
Looks to me like you're on the NA server. I'm looking for people on the OCE server (hence why I put it on the OCE boards) so unless you transfer over you won't be able to join the club.
